name: Easter Escape (codingkook)
description:
Help the eggs escape the Easter Bunny by guiding them to the sleeping momma Hen.

Submission for the Wild Godot Jam #44

  • Fragile: You are an egg (admittedly this is not the most creative take on the theme)
  • Level Menu: The menu teaches you how to play

KNOWN BUGS 🐛

This game was made fast, and leaves a lot to be desired. Known issues:

  • Little eggs can get stuck inside platforms sometimes. Fix by reloading level
  • Easter Bunny sometimes doesn't make jumps

CREDITS 👾

Art + Code: this Easter Kook

Font: 

  • Endear-Regular by Jeron Aguinaldo https://www.1001freefonts.com/endear.font

Music: 

  • Bo by Lo Mimieux from Epidemic Sound
